abstractText: Recent studies which demonstrate intercorrelationsamong the PDO, zooplankton species anomalies, andsurvival of Endangered Species Act (ESA)-listed salmon(e.g., Peterson & Schwing, 2003; Mackas et al., 2007) ledto a hypothesis that climate-driven changes in zooplanktoncommunities impact fish populations throughbottom-up processes.
title: NWFS_Center_Ocean Salmon Survey Vertical Net Zooplankton Analysis v1.0
